TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Sustitución de cables de alimentación
BERS - Sostituzione dei cavi di alimentazione
BERD - Substituição de cabos de alimentação
BERŻ - Bdil tal-kejbils li jwasslu l-kurrent elettriku
BERD - Înlocuire de cabluri de alimentare

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Dushanbe Public Transport Project
Country: Tajikistan
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 8947-GPN-39989
Funding source: EBRD, SSF
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 25.1.2018
Closing date: 24.1.2019 23:59
This general procurement notice updates the original general procurement notice for this project, which was published on the EBRD's Web site on 4.9.2015.

Dushanbe state communal unitary trolleybus company intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank) for the Dushanbe public transport project. The project is co-financed by the grant from the bank’s shareholders special fund (SSF).
The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 8 100 000 USD equivalent, will require the procurement of the following remaining goods, works and services:
Supply of 4 trolleybuses with increased autonomous run, spare parts, maintenance equipment and incidental services
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank will be subject to the bank's procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Mr. Abdulhair Aliev, Head of Project Implementation Unit

Dushanbe state communal unitary trolleybus company intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank) for the Dushanbe public transport project. The project is co-financed by the grant from the bank’s shareholders special fund (SSF).
The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 8 100 000 USD equivalent, will require the procurement of the following remaining goods, works and services:
Supply of 4 trolleybuses with increased autonomous run, spare parts, maintenance equipment and incidental services
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank will be subject to the bank's procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Mr. Abdulhair Aliev, Head of Project Implementation Unit
